title: Escaping Financial Surveillance with Tools Like Monero! (Douglas Tuman Interview)
description:
We're pleased to have Douglas Tuman from MoneroTalk back again to discuss Monero, private forms of payment, cryptocurrencies, and Monerotopia!

Use code 'techlore' for 10% off if any of you are planning to attend Monerotopia: https://monerotopia.com/
